frontmatter.title: Perception frustration
frontmatter.description: Brief encounters leave a lasting impression, and negative impressions take time to correct. The correction starts with communicating the right messages. Find ways to communicate the best aspects, change perception with continued thoughtful application.

frontmatter.title: Internalizing virtues
frontmatter.description: The right instinctual thought processes can turn problems into opportunities, find silver linings, and generally change perceptions of the same experiences

frontmatter.title: Intention matters
frontmatter.description: Most worthwhile endeavors are difficult and require overcoming challenges. The drive to overcome those is largely driven by the intention.

frontmatter.title: Accept reality, act deliberately
frontmatter.description: Don't try to squeeze productivity in. Use time with family well, choose how to spend time, and act deliberately.

frontmatter.title: Cows don't realize their mistakes
frontmatter.description: Think of cars as cows, wandering about with their own purpose. The cows don't think about the people around them before moving. There's no sense getting angry at cows either; they won't even undestand the problem. Get around the cows and be ready for them to act in unexpected ways.

frontmatter.title: Purple cows turn heads
frontmatter.description: Give people a reason to notice and make it exceedingly clear. Don't expect people to notice a different arrangement of the same spots.

frontmatter.title: Make controllable plans
frontmatter.description: There's a lot out of our control. Make plans that don't depend upon perfection from others.

frontmatter.title: Don't let emotions prevent resolution
frontmatter.description: Let go of the emotion of needing to be right. Work towards a solution. Find a way to make it work without letting emotion get in the way.

frontmatter.title: Adjust internal conditions
frontmatter.description: It's always possible to adjust internal conditions. Release expectations, enjoy the present.

frontmatter.title: Release expectations enjoy reality
frontmatter.description: There's no sense in holding on to a reality that doesn't exist. Move on. Find joy in the present reality.
